flawed_nl_solution:
He needs 18 valentine's cards because 30 x 0.6 = <<30*0.6=18>>18
He will spend $36 on these because 18 x 2 = <<18*2=36>>36
The proportion of his income spent is 9 because 36 / 40 = <<36/40=9>>9
This is 900% of his income because 9 x 100 = <<9*100=900>>900
#### 900

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.9, not 9. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
